LanguageData.Empire.label: Christmas Inc
LanguageData.Empire.description:
A high-tech toy distribution network. Their culture is based on a code of joy, a strict E.L.F system, and enforced festiveness.

They bring happiness to children all over the rim every year. Using the wonderous sleigh they can traverse the entire world in one night.

They will refuse to trade with anyone who lacks the appropriate christmas cheer.
